SKT_FIRST.name: Stardust
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. <color=#28d9ed>Heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>1.5%</color> of Lyla's Max Health.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 라일라 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>1.5%</color> 만큼 회복시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を、自分の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>1.5%</color>回復する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Unified Hearts
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect) Reduces damage taken by allies from attacks that target all allies by <color=#28d9ed>5%</color>.

(Triggered Effect) Upon taking damage from an attack that targets all allies, activates an <color=#28d9ed>Agile Response</color> effect.
Grants all allies <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과) 아군들이 전체 공격으로 받는 피해를 <color=#28d9ed>5%</color> 감소시킵니다.

(발동 효과) 전체 공격 피격 시 <color=#28d9ed>신속 대응</color> 효과가 발동합니다.
아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>지속 회복</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)味方が受ける全体攻撃のダメージを<color=#28d9ed>5%</color>DOWNさせる。この効果は【ライラ】が倒れても持続する。

敵から全体攻撃を受けた場合、<color=#28d9ed>【迅速対応】</color>を発動する。
【迅速対応】:味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>継続回復</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。

4: Increases Sustained Recovery duration by 1 turn

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Road to the Light
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>. Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Increased Resilience</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>지속 회복</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color>동안 부여하고, <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>효과 저항</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>継続回復</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与し、<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>効果抵抗</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Adds a barrier (Proportional to target's Health)
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: シールド追加\n(対象のHPが高いほど\nシールド量UP)

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, grants <color=#28d9ed>Sustained Recovery</color> to the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, <color=#28d9ed>heals</color> the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>3.5%</color> of Lyla's Max Health.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 가장 체력 상황이 나쁜 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>지속 회복</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>체력</color>을 라일라 최대 체력의 <color=#28d9ed>3.5%</color> 만큼 회복시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color> : 攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>継続回復</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color> : 攻撃後、残りHPが最も低い味方単体の<color=#28d9ed>HP</color>を自分の最大HPの<color=#28d9ed>3.5%</color>回復させる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
